entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:16 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -41.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 5:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -41.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -45.5°C
Wind: N 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few clouds. High minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 49 in the evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
